data.name: Mister Negative
data.description: An underworld boss whose Darkforce abilities can flip enemies' positive effects, creating openings for his gang of Inner Demons' debilitating attacks.

starItems.name: Mister Negative
starItems.description: An underworld boss whose Darkforce abilities can flip enemies' positive effects, creating openings for his gang of Inner Demons' debilitating attacks.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per Summoned ally

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per Summoned ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target

4.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per Summoned ally.

5.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per Summoned ally.

6.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per Summoned ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per Summoned ally

7.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage per Summoned ally.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>1</color> time. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for this attack.
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from the primary target to the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy.
This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to the primary target
Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>2</color> times

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>2</color> times. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for each attack.
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from the primary target to the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy.
This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to the primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>2</color> times. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for each attack.
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from the primary target to the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy.
This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to the primary target
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>2</color> times. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for each attack.
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from the primary target to the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy.
This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to the primary target
Mind controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>2</color> times. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for each attack.
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from the primary target to the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy.
This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to the primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.

Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>2</color> times. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for each attack.
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from the primary target to the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy.
This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to the primary target
Spread all negative effects from the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.

Mind Control the primary target to attack the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy <color=#86e619>2</color> times. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for each attack.
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to the lowest speed, non-summoned enemy.
This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

1.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
1.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from the primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies

2.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

3.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to a negative effects.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Always flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

4.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects

5.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

6.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to all enemies
Flip all positive effects

7.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + flip all positive effects to negative effects.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
On Spawn, summon an Inner Demon (Cyclops).
On Turn, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Inner Demon in the following order: Inner Demon (Dragon), Inner Demon (Demon), Inner Demon (Cyclops).

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Death of a summoned ally, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from the most injured, non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally with a negative effect.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health

2.description:
On Spawn, summon an Inner Demon (Cyclops).
On Turn, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Inner Demon in the following order: Inner Demon (Dragon), Inner Demon (Demon), Inner Demon (Cyclops).

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Death of a summoned ally, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from the <color=#86e619>1</color> most injured, non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally with a negative effect.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD </color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>5</color> turns
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured, non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, summon an Inner Demon (Cyclops) and gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>5</color> turns.
On Turn, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Inner Demon in the following order: Inner Demon (Dragon), Inner Demon (Demon), Inner Demon (Cyclops).

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Death of a summoned ally, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured, non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies with a negative effect.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD </color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus

4.description:
On Spawn, summon an Inner Demon (Cyclops) and gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>5</color> turns.
On Turn, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Inner Demon in the following order: Inner Demon (Dragon), Inner Demon (Demon), Inner Demon (Cyclops).

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Death of a summoned ally, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured, non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies with a negative effect.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD </color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from all non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health

5.description:
On Spawn, summon an Inner Demon (Cyclops) and gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>5</color> turns.
On Turn, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Inner Demon in the following order: Inner Demon (Dragon), Inner Demon (Demon), Inner Demon (Cyclops).

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Death of a summoned ally, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects from all non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies with a negative effect.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD </color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
